Productsup news | December 28, 2017

Where to Meet Productsup in Q1 2018

Nathalie Kreimes

Team Lead Marketing & Event

What a year! There were many highlights in 2017. Among them, taking home a SEMY award as well as winning Best Search Software Tool at the US Search Awards. We also set up offices across a whopping 5 continents. Our FeedFighter team has gone truly global. It's time we meet! As the Productsup network grows worldwide, we're always on the lookout for opportunities to meet face to face. Thus, our 2018 calendar is brimming with industry events at which you can meet Productsup.

Here are the industry events you can find us at in Q1, 2018:

NRF

Jan 14 - 16. New York (USA)

  • __Industry:__ Ecommerce
  • __Participation:__Attending
  • __Tickets:__Available here

NRF Retail’s Big Show attracts the biggest players in retail, technology and business who are shattering the status quo and driving innovation. With over 35,000 attendees, NRF offers a unique chance to connect with contacts from almost 100 countries and we'd love to catch up if you're in town. NRF 2018 will bring together the largest gathering of industry executives for discussions of the latest industry trends, offering an unparalleled view into how retail brands of all sizes are transforming themselves for the digital age.

  • Meet with Emile Bloemen, SVP Enterprise & Commerce
  • Meet with Igor Ramos, Senior Client Partner LATAM

K8 by Kenshoo

Jan 23 - 25. Napa Vally CA (USA)

  • __Industry:__ Ecommerce (Kenshoo partners)
  • __Participation:__ Presenting
  • __Tickets:__ Request an invite

Kenshoo’s 6th annual invite-only K8 global partner summit is a gathering of top industry leaders dedicated to learning and sharing best practices and new innovations in digital marketing. The theme for K8 2018 is authenticity and how the world’s leading brands, agencies and media platforms are using data, technology and emotional intelligence to build real and genuine relationships with customers at scale. Learn with Productsup: On Day 3, Rob will share his insights as he presents "The Future of Advertising is Feed-Based: Trends and Triumphs". View the full agenda here.

  • Meet with Markus Rottmaier, CSO
  • Meet with Rob Sopkic, Director, Americas

InternetRetailing Expo Indonesia

Jan 24 - 25. Jakarta (Indonesia)

  • __Industry:__ Retail
  • __Participation:__ Attending
  • __Tickets:__ Available here

InternetRetailing Expo Indonesia is targeted at retailers who want to solidify their online presence. Retailers will learn to establish and grow their online strategies through practical case studies and insights from key industry leaders. The two-day event focuses on 6 key topics which include: insight & experience, digital sales & marketing, multichannel merchandising & selling and the omnichannel store of the future.

  • Meet with Ghita Iraqui, Client Partner Manager

Seamless Thailand

Feb 5 - 6. Bangkok (Thailand)

  • __Industry:__ Retail
  • __Participation:__ Attending
  • __Tickets:__ Available here

With conference streams set to cover topics ranging from alternative payments and remittances to e-commerce digital marketing strategies and retail merchandising & pricing, as well as an exhibition filled with the latest in transformative services and products, Seamless Thailand is set to be a one-stop-shop for all those involved in the evolution of Thai commerce.

  • Meet with Arnaud Renoux, Sr. Client Partner Manager

SaaStr Annual

Feb 6 - 8. San Francisco (USA)

  • __Industry:__ SaaS
  • __Participation:__ Attending
  • __Tickets:__ Available here

At Saastr Annual 2018, over 10,000 Founders, Senior Executives, and VCs will come together over three action-packed days of high-quality networking and learning from those who’ve done it. The event offers an epic workshop, captivating CEO interviews and is undoubtedly the largest community of enterprise software enthusiasts on the planet so naturally, we'll be there.

  • Meet with Marcel Hollerbach, CMO

eCommerce Fair Tokyo

Feb 13 - 14. Tokyo (Japan)

  • __Industry:__ Retail
  • __Participation:__ Attending
  • __Tickets:__ Available here

eCommerce Fair Tokyo is the first B2B trade exhibition focusing on eCommerce solutions in Japan. The fair includes a rich seminar program from industry leaders who want to share experience, strategies and market insights. eCommerce Fair Tokyo continues to set the pace as the best market platform for the eCommerce industry to order to increase the web-shopping sales and profits successfully.

  • Meet with Daiji Hanaoka, Director, Japan

MagentoLive Australia

Feb 22 - 23. Sydney (Australia)

  • __Industry:__ eCommerce / Technology
  • __Participation:__ Attending
  • __Tickets:__ Available here

MagentoLive Australia is an opportunity to connect with eCommerce and technology experts from across the country. With the latest tools and tips presented by industry leaders, sponsors, and Magento executives, you’ll be prepared to take your business into the future.

  • Meet with John Sardelic, Director Australia & New Zealand
  • Meet with Lisa van Stiphout, Account Manager ANZ

eTail West

Feb 26 - Mar 3. Palm Springs, CA (USA)

  • __Industry:__ Retail
  • __Participation:__ Attending
  • __Tickets:__ Available here

Thousands of retailers. Hundreds of insights. eTail West is where the top minds in retail meet, collaborate and learn about what's disrupting the industry today and what'll change tomorrow. Designed to build your business and your profit, eTail cuts out the fluff and provides you with content from retail innovators in the trenches.

  • Meet with Patrick Quinn, Sr. Client Partner

Digiday Media Buying Summit

Mar 5 - 7. New Orleans, LA (USA)

  • __Industry:__ Digital Marketing
  • __Participation:__ Attending
  • __Tickets:__ Available here

The Digiday Media Buying Summit, formerly the Digiday Agency Summit, discusses the current advertising landscape and how media agencies can weather tough times while seeking new business opportunities.

  • Meet with Gary Kerr, Agency Partner North America

ITB Berlin

Mar 7 - 11. Berlin (Germany)

  • __Industry:__ Travel
  • __Participation:__ Attending
  • __Tickets:__ Available here

ITB Berlin Convention is the world's leading travel industry think tank – it has established itself as the industry’s main knowledge platform. Top-notch presentations on global trends and innovation make the convention a path-breaking event for the whole tourism industry. Are you a hotelier, MSE or OTA? Do you want to increase your direct bookings and overall ROI? Get in touch with Markus to find out how Productsup can help take your travel feeds to the next level.

  • Meet with Markus Rottmaier, CSO

SXSW

Mar 9 - 18. Austin TX (USA)

  • __Industry:__ Tech, Film, Music
  • __Participation:__ Attending
  • __Tickets:__ Available here

SXSW is best known for celebrating the convergence of the interactive, film, and music industries. The conference also provides a unique networking opportunity for global professionals at every level, bringing together entrepreneurs and founders as well as established businesses to talk about today’s best practices and tomorrow’s most exciting technology trends.

  • Meet with Marcel Hollerbach, CMO

Retail Without Borders

Mar 15. London (UK)

  • __Industry:__ Retail
  • __Participation:__ Attending
  • __Tickets:__ Available here

Retail Without Borders is Europe’s largest online marketplace conference, bringing together established international retailers with world leading global marketplaces. If you are looking to take your business to the next level by expanding your global proposition, this is an event not to be missed!

  • Meet with Emile Bloemen, SVP Enterprise & Commerce

ShopTalk

Mar 18 - 21. Las Vegas (USA)

  • __Industry:__ Ecommerce
  • __Participation:__ Attending
  • __Tickets:__ Available here (free tickets and travel reimbursement for retailers and brands).

ShopTalk covers the rapid evolution of how consumers discover, shop and buy—from new technologies and business models to the latest trends in consumer behaviors, preferences, and expectations. Rob and Patrick will be on hand to talk all things product feed management throughout the four-day expansive event.

  • Meet with Rob Sopkic, Director, Americas
  • Meet with George Walters, Sr Client Partner US

 SMX München

Mar 20 - 21. Munich (Germany)

  • __Industry:__ Search Marketing
  • __Participation:__ Presenting
  • __Tickets:__ Available here (send us an email to receive your 15% Productsup discount)

SMX München is Europe's leading conference for SEO, PPC and Online Marketing. The two-day programme is packed with insightful talks in both English and German from 80+ speakers. Learn with Productsup: On Day 1 at 2.35pm Lena will be joined by norisk's Judith Rogl to showcase Expert tips & tricks to maximize your performance on Google Shopping and Facebook Dynamic Ads campaigns. We'd love to meet if you're around.

  • Meet with Lena Wisser, Head of Account Management

SEMY Awards

Mar 20. Munich (Germany)

  • __Industry:__ Search Marketing
  • __Participation:__ Nominated
  • __Tickets:__ Available here

The German Search Marketing Award, SEMY, brings together the best of the best in the industry to honor outstanding achievements in the categories SEO, SEA and search personality. We're thrilled to have been nominated for an award in SEA Software Innovation and would love to catch up if you're also heading to the ceremony.

  • Catch up with Lena Wisser, Head of Account Management
  • Catch up with Christian Reichert, Regional Sales Manager DACH

InternetRetailing Expo UK

Mar 21 - 22. Birmingham (UK)

  • __Industry:__ Retail
  • __Participation:__ Attending
  • __Tickets:__Available here 

Over 5,000 European retailers and 300+ exhibitors descend upon the NEC each year for the UK’s biggest dedicated multichannel event – InternetRetailing Expo. IRX is for CEO’s, Directors, Senior Managers and Executives who are responsible for delivering multichannel strategies. The event blends marketing with technology, eCommerce with customer facing design, mobile with in-store experience – the full range of skills and capabilities to sell in the multichannel era.

  • Meet with Matt Bailey, Regional Director UK

Online Marketing Rockstars

Mar 22 - 23. Hamburg (Germany)

  • __Industry:__ Online Marketing
  • __Participation:__ Exhibiting in __Hall A3: Stand K8 + K9__
  • __Tickets:__Available here

Our goodie bags are packed and we're all geared up for OMR, Germany's most energetic marketing event of the year. Come and meet the people behind the platform at OMR 2018. Whether you’re a customer or a simply interested in product feed management and what we do, our expert team of FeedFighters will be happy to answer any question you may have.

  • Meet with Lena Wisser, Head of Account Management
  • Meet with Christian Reichert, Regional Sales Manager DACH
  • Meet with Meike Gruber, Head of HR

We hope to see you around! Not attending any of these events but in the area? We'll try to accommodate a face-to-face meeting wherever possible, so simply get in touch with your desired contact to check their availability around the respective events.

Sign up for our monthly newsletter to stay informed about industry updates and events. You'll also get useful tips and learning resources to grow your expertise and online business.
